ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Cost_of_Activity__c < Reimbursement_Amount_Requested__c, NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reimbursement Amount Requested should not be greater than Cost of Activity, please correct.
